mapper.select: select * from (select rownum R, N.* from (select * from notice order by num desc) N) where R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
mapper.insert: insert into notice (num, writer, title, contents, reg_date, hit) values (point_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{contents}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.update: update notice set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents} where num=#{num}
